Package it.polimi.ingsw.game_view

Class GameViewGUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.game_view.GameViewGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameViewClient
public class GameViewGUI extends javafx.application.Application implements GameViewClient
GUI Application, launched at the beginning of the game and interfaces the message from the server with the GUI controller
